title: Current GST rate for PVs outdated; needs a relook: JSW MG Motor India CEO Emeritus
description: Amid speculations that hybrid vehicles could be considered for tax incentives ahead of the Union Budget, he said only the strong 'plug-in' hybrids, which have the capability to also run as a battery electric vehicle independent from the internal combustion engine, should be considered for such benefits.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
